SELECT * FROM ( SELECT
FROM smt_order_entry a
left join smt_order_online c on a.customer_no=c.customer_no and a.product_no=c.product_no
1=1
and a.product_type=#{productType}
and a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
GROUP BY a.customer_no,a.product_no ) bb where 1=1
and bb.customerNo LIKE '%${customerNo}%'
and bb.productNo LIKE '%${productNo}%'
and bb.orderNo LIKE '%${orderNo}%'
and bb.id in (${id})
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY bb.updateDate DESC

SELECT distinct q.id AS "id", q.order_no AS "orderNo", q.order_date AS "orderDate", q.customer_no AS "customerNo", b.customer_name AS "customerName", q.product_no AS "productNo", bom.point_counts AS "pointCounts", q.product_type AS "productType", q.counts - IFNULL( w.goCounts, 0 ) AS "counts", q.create_date AS "createDate", q.create_by AS "createBy.id", q.update_date AS "updateDate", q.update_by AS "updateBy.id", q.remarks AS "remarks", q.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM ( SELECT a.id, a.order_no, a.order_date, a.customer_no, b.customer_name, a.product_no, a.product_type, a.counts, a.create_date, a.create_by, a.update_date, a.update_by, a.remarks, a.del_flag FROM smt_order_entry a LEFT JOIN smt_sys_customer b ON a.customer_no = b.customer_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.product_type = 1 AND a.del_flag = 0 ) q LEFT JOIN ( SELECT go.id, go.customer_no, go.product_no, go.order_no, sum( go.counts ) AS "goCounts", go.point_counts, go.outgo_order_no, go.product_type, go.create_date FROM smt_order_outgo go WHERE del_flag = 0 GROUP BY customer_no, order_no, product_no ) w ON q.customer_no = w.customer_no AND q.order_no = w.order_no AND q.product_no = w.product_no LEFT JOIN smt_sys_customer b ON q.customer_no = b.customer_no LEFT join smt_order_custbom bom on q.customer_no =bom.customer_no and q.product_no =bom.product_no WHERE q.id = #{id}

SELECT q.id AS "id", q.order_no AS "orderNo", q.order_date AS "orderDate", q.customer_no AS "customerNo", b.customer_name AS "customerName", q.product_no AS "productNo", q.product_type AS "productType", q.counts - IFNULL( w.goCounts, 0 ) AS "counts", q.create_date AS "createDate", q.create_by AS "createBy.id", q.update_date AS "updateDate", q.update_by AS "updateBy.id", q.remarks AS "remarks", q.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM ( SELECT a.id, a.order_no, a.order_date, a.customer_no, b.customer_name, a.product_no, a.product_type, a.counts, a.create_date, a.create_by, a.update_date, a.update_by, a.remarks, a.del_flag FROM smt_order_entry a LEFT JOIN smt_sys_customer b ON a.customer_no = b.customer_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.product_type = 1 AND a.del_flag = 0 ) q LEFT JOIN ( SELECT go.id, go.customer_no, go.product_no, go.order_no, sum( go.counts ) AS "goCounts", go.point_counts, go.outgo_order_no, go.product_type, go.create_date FROM smt_order_outgo go WHERE del_flag = 0 GROUP BY customer_no, order_no, product_no ) w ON q.customer_no = w.customer_no AND q.order_no = w.order_no AND q.product_no = w.product_no LEFT JOIN smt_sys_customer b ON q.customer_no = b.customer_no where q.counts - IFNULL( w.goCounts, 0 )!=0
and q.customer_no LIKE '%${customerNo}%'
and q.product_no LIKE '%${productNo}%'
and q.order_no LIKE '%${orderNo}%'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY q.create_date DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT q.id AS "id", q.order_no AS "orderNo", q.order_date AS "orderDate", q.customer_no AS "customerNo", b.customer_name AS "customerName", q.product_no AS "productNo", q.product_type AS "productType", q.counts - IFNULL( w.goCounts, 0 ) AS "counts", q.create_date AS "createDate", q.create_by AS "createBy.id", q.update_date AS "updateDate", q.update_by AS "updateBy.id", q.remarks AS "remarks", q.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM ( SELECT a.id, a.order_no, a.order_date, a.customer_no, b.customer_name, a.product_no, a.product_type, a.counts, a.create_date, a.create_by, a.update_date, a.update_by, a.remarks, a.del_flag FROM smt_order_entry a LEFT JOIN smt_sys_customer b ON a.customer_no = b.customer_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.product_type = 1 AND a.del_flag = 0 ) q LEFT JOIN ( SELECT go.id, go.customer_no, go.product_no, go.order_no, sum( go.counts ) AS "goCounts", go.point_counts, go.outgo_order_no, go.product_type, go.create_date FROM smt_order_outgo go WHERE del_flag = 0 GROUP BY customer_no, order_no, product_no ) w ON q.customer_no = w.customer_no AND q.order_no = w.order_no AND q.product_no = w.product_no LEFT JOIN smt_sys_customer b ON q.customer_no = b.customer_no UNION ALL SELECT distinct entry.id AS "id", entry.order_no AS "orderNo", entry.order_date AS "orderDate", entry.customer_no AS "customerNo", b.customer_name AS "customerName", entry.product_no AS "productNo", entry.product_type AS "productType", entry.counts - IFNULL( c.counts, 0 ) AS "counts", entry.create_date AS "createDate", entry.create_by AS "createBy.id", entry.update_date AS "updateDate", entry.update_by AS "updateBy.id", entry.remarks AS "remarks", entry.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM smt_order_entry entry LEFT JOIN smt_sys_customer b ON entry.customer_no = b.customer_no LEFT JOIN smt_order_outgo c ON entry.customer_no = c.customer_no AND entry.order_no = c.order_no and entry.product_no=c.product_no AND c.del_flag = 0 WHERE entry.product_type = 2 AND entry.del_flag = 0 ) goods where goods.counts!=0
and goods.customerNo LIKE '%${customerNo}%'
and goods.productNo LIKE '%${productNo}%'
and goods.orderNo LIKE '%${orderNo}%'
and goods.id in (${id})

SELECT kk.customerNo, kk.customerName, kk.productNo, kk.productType, IFNULL(gg.counts, 0) as "outCount", kk.counts-IFNULL(gg.counts, 0) as "counts" FROM ( SELECT oe.customerNo, oe.customerName, oe.productNo, oe.productType, sum( oe.counts ) AS "counts" FROM ( SELECT a.id AS "id", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.order_date AS "orderDate", a.customer_no AS "customerNo", b.customer_name AS "customerName", a.product_no AS "productNo", a.product_type AS "productType", a.counts - IFNULL( sum( c.counts ), 0 ) AS "counts", a.package_size AS "packageSize", a.create_date AS "createDate",
a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM smt_order_entry a LEFT JOIN smt_sys_customer b ON a.customer_no = b.customer_no LEFT JOIN smt_order_outgo c ON a.customer_no = c.customer_no AND a.order_no = c.order_no AND a.product_no = c.product_no AND c.del_flag = 0 WHERE a.counts - IFNULL( c.counts, 0 ) != 0 AND a.product_type = 2 AND a.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY a.customer_no, a.product_no, a.order_no ) oe WHERE oe.delFlag = 0 GROUP BY oe.customerNo, oe.productNo ) kk left join smt_order_outgo_dzl gg on kk.customerNo=gg.customer_no and kk.productNo=gg.dzl_id and gg.del_flag=0 where 1=1
and kk.customerNo LIKE '%${customerNo}%'
and kk.productNo LIKE '%${productNo}%'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY kk.customerNo
